mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (name, telphone, program_address, create_time, notes) VALUES (#{customer.name}, #{customer.telphone}, #{customer.programAddress}, #{customer.createTime}, #{customer.notes})
mapper.select: SELECT `id`, name, program_address, telphone, priority, create_time, notes FROM customer ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, name, program_address, priority, create_time, notes FROM customer WHERE telphone = #{tel} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 3
